## Bio
 I am currently a PhD student in [Karen Garrett's Lab](http://www.garrettlab.com) in the department of plant pathology at the University of Florida. My main research interest is using network models to understand plant disease epidemics on a landscape level.




## Research Interests  



* Plant disease epidemiology  
* Network modeling  
* Landscape epidemiology  
* Healthy seed systems  
* Emerging plant pathogens   
* Field crop pathology
